tasks.title: Implement Audio Input Processing
tasks.description: Capture and process audio input from microphone or line-in
tasks.details: Create modules for audio capture, FFT analysis, and feature extraction. Support both microphone and line-in inputs.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for audio processing functions, manual testing with sample audio files

tasks.title: Develop LED Control System
tasks.description: Build system to control LED strips with different patterns
tasks.details: Create LED driver module, pattern generators, and mapping between audio features and visual parameters.
tasks.testStrategy: Test patterns with mock audio input, verify timing and responsiveness

tasks.title: Create Basic User Interface
tasks.description: Implement simple controls for the system
tasks.details: Create interface for selecting visualization modes and adjusting parameters like brightness and sensitivity.
tasks.testStrategy: User testing with simple tasks, verify all controls work as expected

tasks.title: Hardware Integration
tasks.description: Integrate with Raspberry Pi and Pico W hardware
tasks.details: Ensure software works properly on target hardware, optimize for performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on actual hardware, measure latency and resource usage

tasks.title: Enhance Visualization Patterns
tasks.description: Develop additional visualization modes and effects
tasks.details: Create more complex and visually appealing patterns based on audio characteristics.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual testing with various music genres, gather feedback

metadata.description: A system that visualizes audio through LED lights
